thread.title: Woman Jailed in 'Rape Fantasy' Plot Framed
thread.title_full: Woman Jailed in 'Rape Fantasy' Plot Framed

author: Michelle Madigan and Rachael Trost
title: Woman Jailed in 'Rape Fantasy' Plot Framed
text: Michelle Susan Hadley addresses the media after being cleared of all charges in a plot to frame her, after coming out of court in Fullerton, Calif., Monday, Jan. 9, 2017. Hadley has been exonerated of charges that she placed "rape fantasy" ads on Craigslist in order to get men to attack her ex-boyfriend's new wife. Prosecutors now say that it was the alleged victim in the case who was trying to frame her husband's ex by placing the malicious ads. (Jeff Gritchen/The Orange County Register via AP)
